content: I've been experimenting with my Nikon camera and lenses, and I'm excited to try out these settings and techniques on my upcoming birding trip to Costa Rica. Speaking of which, I was wondering if you could recommend any particular birding apps or field guides that might be useful for identifying birds and learning more about their behavior and habitats. I've heard that some apps can even help with bird calls and songs, which would be really helpful for identifying species.
